author: Reuters Editorial
title: Argentina sells $2.9 billion in peso-denominated bonds
text:
BUENOS AIRES, Feb 28 (Reuters) - Argentina sold 58.3 billion pesos ($2.9 billion) in local law bonds, split between 30 billion pesos in bonds maturing in 2020 and 28.3 billion pesos in bonds maturing in 2023, the finance ministry said in a statement on Wednesday.
The government received 68 billion pesos in orders for the 2020 bonds and 29 billion pesos in orders for the 2023 bonds, the ministry said. ($1 = 20.1100 Argentine pesos) (Reporting by Luc Cohen Editing by Tom Brown)
